entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,2}{F813,0,56004}Much to our chagrin, it seemed those{F801}demonic girls knocked we menfolk out.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,2}{F813,0,56004}Much to our chagrin, it seemed those{F801}demonic girls knocked we menfolk out.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,56006}You men really are useless in a crisis.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,56006}You men really are useless in a crisis.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F813,0,56009}All prentices, this is Hope speaking.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,56010}I've seen the record of your battle{F801}with the Black Samurai. I'd like to{F801}hear the tale in your words.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F813,0,56009}All prentices, this is Hope speaking.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,56010}I've seen the record of your battle{F801}with the Black Samurai. I'd like to{F801}hear the tale in your words.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F87B,4,8,1,1}{F813,0,56011}As I was conscious through it all,{F801}please allow me...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F87B,4,8,1,1}{F813,0,56011}As I was conscious through it all,{F801}please allow me...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F87B,4,9,1,1}{F813,0,56012}Though we discovered and attempted to{F801}capture the Black Samurai, she called{F801}upon demons, thwarting our efforts.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F87B,4,9,1,1}{F813,0,56012}Though we discovered and attempted to{F801}capture the Black Samurai, she called{F801}upon demons, thwarting our efforts.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F813,0,56013}Demons...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,56014}This bears explaining in more detail.{F801}Return to the forest entrance at once.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F813,0,56013}Demons...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,56014}This bears explaining in more detail.{F801}Return to the forest entrance at once.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F813,0,56003}You wouldn't awaken no matter how{F801}much we tried talking to you,{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F813,0,56003}You wouldn't awaken no matter how{F801}much we tried talking to you,{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,56005}Walter and I were both head-over-heels{F801}for them... It was Isabeau who brought{F801}us to our senses.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,56005}Walter and I were both head-over-heels{F801}for them... It was Isabeau who brought{F801}us to our senses.{F801}
